fields.label: Office Equipments including Computers, Fax, Photocopy etc
Cover for curios and work of art
Cover for property in the open
Including property in the care, custody & control of the insured
72 Hours clause-wording modified- the 72 hours will stretch beyond the expiration of the policy period provided the first earthquake/flood/storm occurred prior to the expiry time of the policy.
Automatic reinstatement of sum insured at pro-rata additional premium
Cover for personal effects of staff / guests property / valuables
Cover to include unregistered motorised vehicles (like passenger, luggage, laundry carts) used on or around the premises
Personal effects of employee including tools and bicycles
Landslip full subsidence and ground heave
Architecture or surveyor, consulting engineer & other professional fee
Expense to protect preserve or reduce the loss
During fit out works, renovation works, or any alteration/repairs all losses above the limit of the PESP of CAR should be covered under the property
cover for bursting,overflowing, discharging,or leaking of water tanks apparatus or pipes when premises are empty or disused
Impact damage due to own vehicle and / or animals
Burglary extension from diesel tank and similar storage facilities
Cover of extra charges for overtime, nightwork, work on public holidays exprss freight, air freight
Assiatnce and co-operation of the Insured
Computers all risk including damages to computers, additional expenses and media reconstruction cost
Cover for deterioration due to change in temperature or humidity or failure / inadequate operation of an airconditioning cooling or heating system

Electrical clause waiver- Loss or damage by fire to electrical or electronic appliances , installations and wiring insured by this policy arising from or occasioned by over running, overheating excessive current, short circuiting, arcing, self-heating or leakage of electricity from whatever cause (lightning included) is covered

Brokers Claim Handling Clause : A loss notification received by the Insurance Broker will be deemed as a loss notification to Insurer. All communications flowing between the Insurer, Insured and the appointed Loss Surveyor should be channelized through the Broker, unless there is any unavoidable reasons compelling direct communications between the parties
Cover to include portable items worldwide
Property in the open or open sided sheds other than building structure and machineries which are designed to exist and to operate in the open
Reinstatement Value  clause (85% condition of  average)
Waiver  of subrogation (against affiliates and subsidiaries)
Cancellation clause-30 days either party subject to pro-rata refund of premium in either case unless a claim attached
Automatic Addition deletion clause to be notified within 30 days period
Expense to reduce the loss clause
Cover for property lying in the premises in containers
Including loss or damage due to subsidence, ground heave or landslip
Nominated Loss Adjuster clause-Insured can select the loss surveyor out of a panel John Kidd LA, Cunningham Lindsey, & Miller International
Including accidental damage to plate glass, interior and exterior signs
Strike riot and civil commotion clause
Cover for  mechanical, electrical and electronic breakdown  for fixed non-mobile plant and machinery
Cover for electrical equipment or wiring due  to electric current also even if the fire originated  therefrom
Cover for external works including sign boards,  landscaping  including trees in building
Automatic cover for newly purchased items
Accidental damage to fixed glass, glass (other than fixed glass)
Electronic installation, computers, data processing, equipment and other fragile or brittle object
Loss Notification  as soon as reasonably practicable
